column4: is anyone good with mplayer?  is there a way to convert to mp3 on the fly?  this is the command I'm using to successfully grab a .rm
mplayer -playlist file.ram -ao pcm -aofile file.wav -vc dummy -vo null
how do I convert this to .mp3 on the fly?
That's just to dump the stream, have to convert the dumped wav with mencoder.
